expected_behavior: Spawns 9 parallel subagents for comprehensive review
Verifies API signatures against Retro68 headers or Docker container
Checks MacTCP documentation for ASR rules and restrictions
Validates ISR-safety using Table B-3 from Inside Macintosh
Reviews logging provisions and identifies missing error/state transition logs
Synthesizes findings into standardized format with priority levels
Offers to auto-apply all recommended changes with user confirmation
